subject: Tom & Lisa Butler . . . EVPs, etc.
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Just thought I'd drop in to let you know Tom emailed me regarding Sarah Estep's TEAC A 6300 reel to reel tape recorder, she used with a standard dynamic mic, plus told me www.AAEVP.com is now www.ATransC.org, so thought you all should know - for more researching info.!  PEACE!   =Judy=
